title: Sainte-Marie, Ille-et-Vilaine
text:
Sainte-Marie (; ) is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Ille-et-Vilaine">Ille-et-Vilaine</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in <a href="Brittany%20%28administrative%20region%29">Brittany</a> in northwestern <a href="France">France</a>.
Population.
Inhabitants of Sainte-Marie are called "samaritains" in French.
